enhanced_by.reason: The addArg method must be invoked before getArg to ensure that the Arg objects are available in the args array.
The ensureArgsCapacity method ensures that the args array has sufficient capacity to store the Arg objects, which is necessary before calling getArg.
The getArgs method retrieves an array of Arg objects, which can be used to construct assertions for the getArg method as they both deal with Arg objects.
The getVar method retrieves a Var object, which can be used to construct assertions for the getArg method as both methods deal with retrieving objects based on a key.
